item.title: Bloober Team developing new game based on Konami IP
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/bloober-team-developing-new-game-based-on-konami-ip

Collaboration continues following success of Silent Hill 2.

Following the success of 2024’s Silent Hill 2 remake, which shipped and digitally sold over two million units, Konami and Polish developer Bloober Team have announced the signing of an agreement for a new game based on a Konami intellectual property. Konami will serve as the publisher.

“Our collaboration with Konami has been incredibly fruitful, and the success of Silent Hill 2 speaks for itself,” said Bloober Team CEO Pitor Babieno in a press release. “By sharing knowledge and experience, we have been able to create high-quality production together. Of course, we can’t reveal too many details at this time, but we are confident that fans will be just as excited about our collaboration as we are. We can’t wait to share something truly special with players when the time is right.”

Further information was not announced.
